posts.postText:
Hello,
Gash told me I should make a file hosting thing for NNJG, so I did.
 http://onlinecomphelp.com 
Go there.
You MUST be registered to upload.
It saves your uploads, and you can delete them, and put them into folders.
If you need a file type allowed that is currently not supported, post it on this thread.
I hosted it on an old domain because I have more bandwith there.
